ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Problem with Bellow?
ygData.msgSnippet: Bellow works once and then you have to click it off and start it again or start another song. If you leave it goin it ll eventually turn itself off. However in
ygData.messageBody:
Bellow works once and then you have to click it off and start it again or
start another song. If you leave it goin it'll eventually turn itself off.
However in order to twist or weave songs you only want to play them till you
see the effect or resist message, then start a new song. What you are
describing is normal.

Arud Bastad
38th Level Songstacker
Pending Lore

om]On Behalf Of Rebecca Small
Sent: Sunday, April 08, 2001 8:03 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Problem with Bellow?


Has anyone else noticed that when you use Brusco's Bellow, all the song
icons stay grayed out like the song is in progress until you click one of
them to turn it off? I get my damage (or resist message) but then the
song
just never seems to complete its cycle, and I have tried waiting quite
awhile.

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Excalibur, Xegony
